[bq="trashboat"]!http://i.imgur.com/4sRS3IU.jpg![/bq]
Side note: *most* of the people that I have met that use the phrase "cishit" aren't actually glbt and just doing it cause it's trendy.


SJW, "yeah I'm totally bisexual; I've held other girl's hands before"
"Have you made out with them?"
"Eww no"
Me, "Hey"
Boyfriend, "huh?"
*VIGOROUS MAKING OUT!*
SJW, "eww same-sex stuff is gross!"
Me, "then how are you bisexual if you're not sexually attracted to both sexes?"

On the one hand I find these individuals who pretend to be glbt for the sake of being trendy disgusting; on the other hand I totally fucking called it years ago that being glbt was eventually going to be the new "in" thing.

topics.body:
I really wish there was a way to block people's art on Deviantart.

I search for this one thing and instead, it shows me irl pictures of top naked girls boxing and punching tits and "parts".

It doesn't turn me on. It annoys me when I want to search for something.
